name: mango-db-replace-api-endpoint
description: A **scalable, database-agnostic API** designed to **replace the MongoDB Data API endpoint** with a SQL backend. This project allows you to interact with SQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, D1) using a **MongoDB-like API**. Itâ€™s built to work with **Cloudflare Workers**, **Hono**, and **D1**, but can be adapted to other backend environments and databases.
